nodes.bodyText:
We are doing an automatic form post here. So "you're being redirected" might give a wrong impression that we are doing a redirect.
@ayshsandu @janakamarasena WDYT?
What about "Please wait while we are processing your request" ?
Need to change the next message also accordingly. Click the submit button if automatic redirection failed. -> Click the submit button if automatic submission failed. ?

What about "Please wait while we are processing your request" ?

How about
"Please wait while we complete your request"

We changed the phrases to the following after a discussion with @ayshsandu
Main message
Please wait while we take you to the application.
The description for action button
Click continue if you have been waiting for too long.
@mefarazath WDYT of that approach?
